name: Kitchen Krisis
description:
Play as Carrie the Carrot. Her mission is to help Gordon the Chef fix and complete his dish before time runs out. Switch from Animated Mode into Veggie Mode when he gets close to avoid being seen by him. Find and awaken fellow ingredients in the kitchen. Switch between controlling different characters to finish the recipe!

Arrow keys / A,D : Movement

Spacebar : Jump

Z: Veggie Mode

R: Restart

1,2,3: Toggle Current Character

Hint!: Click the "Recipe" button on the bottom right for details on your mission
